subtitle: A delicious combination of mixed seafood served with a simple sauce.

method.text: Remove bone and skin from salmon and monkfish. Cut into cubes. Thread fish and prawns onto 2 skewers. Season.
Place cucumber, mint, stock and wine into a pan and bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 min. Discard mint stalk.
Place sauce in a blender and puree. Return sauce to pan and add cream. Bring to boil and continue to boil until reduced by about half.
Prehat grill. Brush brochettes with oil. and cook under a preheated grill for about 10 min, turning twice. Serve the brochettes with the cucumber sauce.
Grill for about 10 min, turning twice. Serve the brochettes with the cucumber sauce.

title: Salmon, monkfish & prawn brochettes with cucumber & mint sauce
